item.description: http://www.somedaysthemovie.com/pages/trailer.php Real Art Ways Members: $5 Non-members: Regular Admission: $9.00 RAW Movie starts at 7pm... The Dates are May 6th- May 12th The REVIEWS.. The slender, tender threads of plot involve aspirations, creativity, missed connections, and the tragic disposability of human life in an age when throwing things away - even precious things - is the norm." - Shawn Levy, The Oregonian "McCormick has translated song into cinema, where tone and feeling supersede plot and arc." – Leslie Stonebreaker, New York Press "Matt McCormick insists on portraying the unavoidable reality of work, rebutting the popular image of Portland as a paradise for under-achieving hipsters." – New Directors/New Films
item.why: Show starts @ 7pm http://www.somedaysthemovie.com This character-driven film follows a web of awkward characters who maintain hope by inventing their own forms of communication and self-fulfillment.

group.name: Beyond the Multiplex: Hartford's Indie and Foreign Film fans

item.name: Some Days Are Better Than Others @ Real Art Ways
